verses.verse: Moreover David <WH1732> and the captains <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> separated <WH914> to the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>, and of Heman <WH1968>, and of Jeduthun <WH3038>, who should prophesy <WH5012> <WH5030> with harps <WH3658>, with psalteries <WH5035>, and with cymbals <WH4700>: and the number <WH4557> of the workmen <WH582> <WH4399> according to their service <WH5656> was:

Of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>; Zaccur <WH2139>, and Joseph <WH3130>, and Nethaniah <WH5418>, and Asarelah <WH841>, the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623> under the hands <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623>, which prophesied <WH5012> according to the order <WH3027> of the king <WH4428>.

Of Jeduthun <WH3038>: the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038>; Gedaliah <WH1436>, and Zeri <WH6874>, and Jeshaiah <WH3470>, Hashabiah <WH2811>, and Mattithiah <WH4993>, six <WH8337>, under the hands <WH3027> of their father <WH1> Jeduthun <WH3038>, who prophesied <WH5012> with a harp <WH3658>, to give thanks <WH3034> and to praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068>.

Of Heman <WH1968>: the sons <WH1121> of Heman <WH1968>; Bukkiah <WH1232>, Mattaniah <WH4983>, Uzziel <WH5816>, Shebuel <WH7619>, and Jerimoth <WH3406>, Hananiah <WH2608>, Hanani <WH2607>, Eliathah <WH448>, Giddalti <WH1437>, and Romamti-ezer <WH7320>, Joshbekashah <WH3436>, Mallothi <WH4413>, Hothir <WH1956>, and Mahazioth <WH4238>:

All these were the sons <WH1121> of Heman <WH1968> the king's <WH4428> seer <WH2374> in the words <WH1697> of God <WH430>, to lift up <WH7311> the horn <WH7161>. And God <WH430> gave <WH5414> to Heman <WH1968> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> sons <WH1121> and three <WH7969> daughters <WH1323>.

All these were under the hands <WH3027> of their father <WH1> for song <WH7892> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>, with cymbals <WH4700>, psalteries <WH5035>, and harps <WH3658>, for the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, according to the king's <WH4428> order <WH3027> to Asaph <WH623>, Jeduthun <WH3038>, and Heman <WH1968>.

So the number <WH4557> of them, with their brethren <WH251> that were instructed <WH3925> in the songs <WH7892> of the LORD <WH3068>, even all that were cunning <WH995>, was two hundred <WH3967> fourscore <WH8084> and eight <WH8083>.
Â¶ And they cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>, ward <WH4931> against <WH5980> ward, as well the small <WH6996> as the great <WH1419>, the teacher <WH995> as the scholar <WH8527>.

Now the first <WH7223> lot <WH1486> came forth <WH3318> for Asaph <WH623> to Joseph <WH3130>: the second <WH8145> to Gedaliah <WH1436>, who with his brethren <WH251> and sons <WH1121> were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The third <WH7992> to Zaccur <WH2139>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The fourth <WH7243> to Izri <WH3339>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The fifth <WH2549> to Nethaniah <WH5418>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The sixth <WH8345> to Bukkiah <WH1232>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The seventh <WH7637> to Jesharelah <WH3480>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The eighth <WH8066> to Jeshaiah <WH3470>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The ninth <WH8671> to Mattaniah <WH4983>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The tenth <WH6224> to Shimei <WH8096>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> to Azareel <WH5832>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> to Hashabiah <WH2811>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> to Shubael <WH7619>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> to Mattithiah <WH4993>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> to Jeremoth <WH3406>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The sixteenth <WH8337> <WH6240> to Hananiah <WH2608>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> to Joshbekashah <WH3436>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The eighteenth <WH8083> <WH6240> to Hanani <WH2607>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The nineteenth <WH8672> <WH6240> to Mallothi <WH4413>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The twentieth <WH6242> to Eliathah <WH448>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The one <WH259> and twentieth <WH6242> to Hothir <WH1956>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The two <WH8147> and twentieth <WH6242> to Giddalti <WH1437>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The three <WH7969> and twentieth <WH6242> to Mahazioth <WH4238>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:
The four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> to Romamti-ezer <WH7320>, he, his sons <WH1121>, and his brethren <WH251>, were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>.
